corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: The girls exchanged nervous glances , thinking that it must be Miss Hardbroom come to reprimand them for being out of bed .
